鞠.definition: to incline (one's torso); to bow; leather ball used in ancient times; (literary) to bring up; to rear; Taiwan pr. [ju2]

鞠躬盡力.definition: to bend to a task and spare no effort (idiom); striving to the utmost; same as 鞠躬盡瘁|鞠躬尽瘁[ju1 gong1 jin4 cui4]

鞠躬盡瘁.definition: to bend to a task and spare no effort (idiom); striving to the utmost

鞠躬盡瘁，死而後已.pinyin: jū gōng jǐn cuì ， sǐ ér hòu yǐ
鞠躬盡瘁，死而後已.definition: to bend to a task and spare no effort unto one's dying day (idiom); striving to the utmost one's whole life; with every breath in one's body, unto one's dying day
